section.name: Upgrading OpenMeetings
section.p: There is a System Backup and Import tool. Login as Administrator and Goto > Backup

The Text in the Administration>Backup section actually just says it all. The backup contains users, rooms, organizations and appointements (Invitations and Reminders are NOT included in the Backup and Reminders will not be send again!). The Backup contains also all uploaded Files and Documents and will re-import them again.
Max Upload Size is 1000 MB.
